mapper.select: /* getIssue */ SELECT A.*, ST_X(A.location) AS longitude, ST_Y(A.location) AS latitude, (SELECT data_group_name FROM data_group WHERE data_group_id = A.data_group_id) AS dataGroupName, (SELECT user_name FROM user_info WHERE user_id = A.user_id) AS userName, B.contents FROM issue A LEFT OUTER JOIN issue_detail B ON A.issue_id = B.issue_id WHERE A.issue_id = #{issueId}
mapper.delete: /* deleteIssue */ DELETE FROM issue WHERE issue_id = #{issueId}
/* deleteIssueDetail */ DELETE FROM issue_detail WHERE issue_id = #{issueId}
